ingredients: 1 (1-oz.) pkg. Old El Paso™ Taco Seasoning Mix
1 lb. boneless beef sirloin steak, cut into thin bite-sized strips
1 large onion, cut into thin wedges
2 medium yellow, green and/or red bell peppers, cut into thin lengthwise strips
Reserved 2 teaspoons Old El Paso™ Taco Seasoning Mix
1 medium avocado, pitted, peeled and chopped
